text: @MarioDB @realDonaldTrump @AmericanAir @iflymia Trump falsely claimed that the administration's botched rollout of coronavirus testing was former President Barack Obama's fault, even though the new coronavirus did not even exist when his predecessor was in office and neither did tests for it.
